mng: (of taste) hot or pungent, hard, laborious, suffering, eighth in order, eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1], letter "H" or roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc, ancient Chinese compass point: 285°, octa

exm.mng: hard, exhausting, with much toil, thanks for your trouble
Xinji county level city in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei
forty eighth year H12 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1971 or 2031, cf 辛亥革命[Xin1 hai4 Ge2 ming4], Xinhai Revolution of 1911
